FuncDef: The display default-parameter bmp command displays default BGP Monitoring Protocol (BMP) configurations. The display default-parameter bmp command displays default BGP Monitoring Protocol (BMP) configurations.
ExtraInfo: To check the default interval at which a router sends BGP running statistics to a monitoring server and whether statistics about all received routes or only accepted routes are sent to the monitoring server, run the display default-parameter bmp command.
